questions.question: Which of these is NOT one of the three confessions that frame the gospel of Mark?

choices.answer: The beginning of the good news about Jesus the Messiah . . .
Peter: “You are the Messiah”
Roman Soldier: “Surely this was the Son of God”
Mary: “The Messiah is Risen”

questions.question: Of what is the number of the disciples a symbolic echo?

choices.answer: The twelve moons in a year
The seven days in a week
The three members of the Trinity
The twelve tribes of Israel

questions.question: According to the textbook, which of Jesus’ parables (in Mark) is the most significant?

choices.answer: The mustard seed
The wheat and Tares
The shrewd manager
The Sower

questions.question: How does the Gospel of Mark end?

choices.answer: With Jesus appearing to the twelve in the upper room
With the ascension of Jesus into heaven
With the witnesses of the empty tomb terrified
With the Great Commission

questions.question: In Mark, how does Jesus’ public ministry begin?

choices.answer: His baptism by John in the Jordan
His wilderness temptation
His preaching in the synagogues of Nazareth
His cleansing of the Temple in Jerusalem
